meanings.definition: A person or thing that causes damage.
meanings.sent1: The careless driver was the damager of the mailbox.
meanings.sent2: The storm was the damager of the roof.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel turned into a little damager of the garden.
meanings.sent4: Time can be a silent damager of memories.
meanings.sent5: The rust slowly spread like a sneaky damager on the old metal gate.

meanings.definition: The act of causing harm or injury.
meanings.sent1: The explosion was the damager of the building.
meanings.sent2: The damager of the forest fire was unknown.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy's tail became the accidental damager of the vase.
meanings.sent4: Gossip can be a hidden damager of relationships.
meanings.sent5: The virus acted as a silent damager to the computer system.
